docs.snippet: Discover the deeper wisdom of your smartphone’s annoying spellchecker....
docs.lead_paragraph: Discover the deeper wisdom of your smartphone’s annoying spellchecker.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Mary Phillips-Sandy counters widespread dislike of autocorrect feature on text messaging applications with examples of how autocorrect feature actually enriches communication.

docs.snippet: The San Antonio Spurs handed the Dallas Mavericks one of their more humiliating home defeats in franchise history with a 116-90 victory on Friday in front a stunned-silent sellout crowd at American Airlines Center....
